alert.note: Alert for Marion; McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 7:26AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of McPherson and southwestern Marion Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 726 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Windom, or 14 miles southwest of Lindsborg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mcpherson, Hillsboro, Moundridge, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Goessel, Lehigh, Windom, Mcpherson Airport and Marion Lake. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 46 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
